The true friend, or A bill of exchange expressed in a sermon preached at White-hall: vpon Sonday the XIII. of December, anno Domini, 1629. By Iohn Dovvle, Doctor of Divinitie, and his Maiesties chaplaine. Dowle, John.
[6], 73, [1] p.
Printed by W. I[ones] for Nicholas Bourne, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange, London : 1630.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
